title: The Gay Book of Lists
description: The third edition of Leigh Rutledge's hugely popular Gay Book of Lists is loaded with pertinent new facts and figures to keep even the most resolute of trivia hounds happy. What more can you ask of a book than that it include information such as 30 picturesque slang expressions for masturbation5 men it would have been better not to have gone home with18 celebrity homophobes15 terrible historical events that gay people have been blamed for12 stupefying quotes from Pat Robertson Leigh Rutledge is the author of 16 books, including Gay Friends, Too Much of a Good Thing, Nice Girls Don't Wear Cha-Cha Heels and If People Were Cats .
author: Leigh W. Rutledge
